Honey Poland

Second Skin

Second Skin is a cyanotype series made by stretching worn tights onto acrylic sheets and exposing them in sunlight. The prints hold onto small details like ladders, creases, stretched seams - marks left behind by the body. Cropped and bound into two B4 hand-made photobooks, the work looks at the layers we wear and the ones we keep hidden. There�s a closeness in these textures, a quietness. What�s left behind says just as much as what�s shown, if not more.
